DOC.brief_summary: To study the association between aristolochic acid and urothelial carcinoma in Taiwan
DOC.brief_title: Aristolochic Acid-DNA Adduct in Urothelial Carcinoma in Taiwan
DOC.criteria: the resected kidney tissue in the tissue bank the patients who had been ever exposed to arsenics, rubber, chemicals, irradiation for pelvis, or received chemotherapy.
